attributes.action: Get rid of childish MPs who believe their only role is to line their pockets!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition isnt to hound a man out of his job, rather it is to get rid of the MPs who belong in a school playground rather than the Houses of Parliament where they are supposed to be representing the people!

rejection.details: It is unclear what you are requesting. If you are trying to make a point about MPs' expenses, we suggest you contact Parliament directly. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
